physical_examinations.relevant_findings: GEN: A&O, NAD; HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist; CV: RRR, No M/G/R; PULM: Clear to auscultation b/l, No W/R/R; ABD: Soft, nondistended, minimally tender, incisions c/d/i. No rebound or guarding; Ext: No edema, warm and well perfused.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Gallbladder wall edema and thickness was persistent but slightly improved compared to the prior ultrasound.
